attributes.action: I am mentioning the subject of heatlh
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The subject is all about the danger of white sugar and the harm it does to our bodies.
So sweet oh so sweet that is what we wanted it tastes like sugar.
For energy we desire sweetness in our diet. Sugar, put a spoonful of sugar in my tea or coffee as part of my diet; remember this is pure white sugar.
It comes in many forms and sizes and often colours. Grind it to a powder grind it to a fine powder and sprinkle it on some cake after it’s has been baked. The dough is already full of ½ cup of sugar because it says it in the recipe whoever wrote it and that sugar is granulated.
That’s the recipe and it’s full of refined flour and sugar.
Now and there’s the sugar sweet alternative. The sweet alternative in fact it tastes sweeter than sugar. Barley and rice are grains both can be transformed or fermented into sweet textures just like barley malt and rice syrup. They are both very sweet and good alternatives.
Sugar is the flavour and sweetness is the desire.Refined sugar tastes sickly sweet. Natural sugar tastes simply out of this world and its sugar sweet.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
